entry.title: Some more lightning-related git repos
entry.summary: Earlier today, the -wizards IRC channel revealed two repositories that Bryan had not reviewed for quality, security or functionality. The repositories are https://github.com/LightningNetwork/lnd and https://github.com/LightningNetwork/lightning-onion. Additionally, Bryan provided links to other git repositories with related work such as https://github.com/ElementsProject/lightning and https://github.com/matsjj/thundernetwork. It is important to note that Bryan does not have any word to offer regarding the status of these repositories. Bryan's contact details were also included in the context: http://heybryan.org/ and 1 512 203 0507.
